name: UpdateCustomEventDefinition
description:
Update a specific custom event definition by name.

Use this tool to update the definition of a specific custom event in Hubspot by specifying the event name.

parameters.name: internal_event_name
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event to be updated in Hubspot.

value_schema.description: The internal name of the custom event.

parameters.name: event_description
parameters.description: Provide a description for the custom event to be displayed as help text in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: A description of the event that will be shown as help text in HubSpot.

parameters.name: event_label
parameters.description: The human-readable label for the event, used in the HubSpot UI.

value_schema.description: Human readable label for the event. Used in HubSpot UI

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Hubspot Events API

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event.

value_schema.description: The internal name of the custom event.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description of the event that will be shown as help text in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: A description of the event that will be shown as help text in HubSpot.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Human readable label for the event. Used in HubSpot UI

value_schema.description: Human readable label for the event. Used in HubSpot UI

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
